sentence: The neologism that connects New Agers and Madison Cawthorn, explained Republicans are plenty media-savvy, especially around dirt-flinging, so there's little doubt that they understand the dangers of the Streisand effect.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: Why Madison Cawthorn triggers Republicans
